abstract: BNP Paribas has hired a former Bank of America executive, Chris Innes, to head equity sales for the Americas in New York, Reuters reported.
snippet: BNP Paribas has hired a former Bank of America executive, Chris Innes, to head equity sales for the Americas in New York, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: BNP Paribas has hired a former Bank of America executive, Chris Innes, to head equity sales for the Americas in New York, Reuters reported, citing a person familiar with the matter.

headline.main: BNP Chooses Former BofA Executive for Equity Sales
